categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Razer, born Shakren san Jukii, was a Kaleesh male, who was a former Jedi before becoming a Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War. When the Star Cabal disassembled the Operations branch of Imperial Intelligence, Razer absorbed the Cipher Nine' squad into his army, though he had Kaliyo Djannis arrested, and departed for the battlefront of Corellia. There, Razer was killed by a Jedi Knight, who moments later was killed himself.
